comments.body: This is not the signature I expect from map.
I agree ðŸ˜… it changed to something more familiar in a later commit

+package scala.meta.languageserver.storage
+
+import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets

+trait Bytes[A] { self =>
+  def fromBytes(bytes: Array[Byte]): A
+  def toBytes(e: A): Array[Byte]

comments.body: I don't understand why this is B => A instead of A => B.
